turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I need to check my account balance and see the last few transactions. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Please provide your account number and the last four digits of your social security number for verification. Then I can show you your balance and recent transactions.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, account number is 1234567890 and the last four digits of my SSN are 1234. Now, show me the last ten transactions, not just a few. Also, I'm a bit frustrated, why do I have to re-enter my info every time? Seems inefficient.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Analyzing your account, and the last ten transactions are: [transaction list - details omitted for brevity]. Regarding your frustration, I understand. The current security protocols require verification for each session. We are working on options to improve convenience while maintaining security, such as biometric login or secure device registration. Your feedback is valuable and has been logged. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
